column4: i want to ask. why don't they do some installations in ubuntu more simple? like the tor installation which i havn't succeed with
why does my toolbar bookmarks dissapeard?
they are simple, you cant even chosse defaults apps its that simple
intel drivers are easy. I have a guide
http://webupd8.blogspot.com/2009/05/reverting-xorg-video-intel-driver-of.html
you do realise nearly ALL netbooks use crappy intel chips so there are billions of guides on how to set them up
thats wat the internet is for
most are step by step, like taht one i gave
because not all systems are identical so you need to work a bit yourself
you can join a non-existant channel and it will be spawned
check dmesg | less    as well as /var/log/Xorg.0.log
mgv1: check dmesg | less    as well as /var/log/Xorg.0.log: i dont know what is dmseg and do i need to post the xorg content of the computer?
dmesg is the kernel messages since the kernel came online
how do i check whats in it?
dmesg | less
if you just want the last few messages use: dmesg | tail
so thanks and i will try to bring it tommorow when i use the computer
it sshouldnt, if you alt+tab to a window with firefox running an maximised, can you not minimise the other app?
do you have the "windows list" application on the bottom bar? It lists the running apps
no i dont have windows list
could be why
how do i get a list of running applications?
add the windows list: rigt click bar -> add item   then add windows list
